content: Police arrested a man, 27, after an incident in Corwen, North Wales, on FridayA 33-year-old woman and three children were admitted to hospital with injuries Armed police have arrested a 27-year-old man after a woman and three children were rushed to hospital with injuries.

Police were called to a 'serious and concerning' incident in Corwen, North Wales, on Friday and arrested the man on suspicion of attempted murder.A 33-year-old woman was admitted to hospital with serious injuries and is in a 'stable but critical' condition.A child also remains in hospital with serious injuries and two other children have since been discharged.North Wales police detective chief inspector Chris Bell said: 'Inquiries are ongoing into what has clearly been a serious and concerning incident and we fully appreciate the concern it has caused in the local community.'
Anyone who may have information that could help police with their investigation is asked to contact North Wales Police by calling 101 and quoting reference number A06 60 20.
